statements: SELECT platform_name, spark_version FROM big_data_platforms ORDER BY platform_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM big_data_platforms WHERE hadoop_support = TRUE;
SELECT platform_name, spark_version FROM big_data_platforms WHERE platform_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM big_data_platforms ORDER BY platform_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_platforms FROM big_data_platforms;
SELECT * FROM big_data_platforms WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, spark_version FROM big_data_platforms WHERE hadoop_support = true;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name FROM big_data_platforms ORDER BY platform_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM big_data_platforms WHERE spark_version LIKE '%3.0%';
SELECT platform_id, platform_name FROM big_data_platforms WHERE spark_version <> '2.4';
SELECT id, name, age FROM HadoopIntegration;
SELECT name, id, age FROM HadoopIntegration;
SELECT * FROM SparkIntegration;
SELECT email, city, id FROM SparkIntegration;
SELECT id, name FROM HadoopIntegration WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM HadoopIntegration WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM HadoopIntegration WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT id, name FROM HadoopIntegration WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM SparkIntegration WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT email FROM SparkIntegration WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM table1;
SELECT name, age FROM table1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT country, email FROM table2 WHERE country='USA';
SELECT id, name, age FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM table3 WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM table1 WHERE id = 1;
SELECT country, user_id FROM table2 WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM table3 WHERE price > 100 AND quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM table1 JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.user_id WHERE table1.age < 40 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age FROM integration_hadoop_spark
SELECT * FROM hadoop_data
SELECT job_name, start_time, end_time FROM sql_bigdata_integration
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM hadoop_data WHERE data_type='numeric'
SELECT timestamp, analysis_result, worker_id FROM spark_analytics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, name, age, location FROM integration_hadoop_spark WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM hadoop_data WHERE data_value BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY data_name ASC
SELECT job_name, start_time, end_time FROM sql_bigdata_integration WHERE end_time > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY start_time
SELECT record_id, DATE(timestamp) AS date_only, analysis_result FROM spark_analytics WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) = 9 ORDER BY record_id
SELECT id, name, location FROM integration_hadoop_spark WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND age < 40 ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM BigDataPlatforms;
SELECT platform_name FROM BigDataPlatforms WHERE platform_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SQLDatabases ORDER BY db_name DESC;
SELECT db_type FROM SQLDatabases WHERE db_id = 3;
SELECT platform_name, db_name FROM BigDataPlatforms JOIN SQLDatabases ON BigDataPlatforms.platform_id = SQLDatabases.db_id;
SELECT * FROM BigDataPlatforms;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name FROM BigDataPlatforms ORDER BY platform_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SQLDatabases WHERE db_type = 'MySQL';
SELECT db_name, db_type FROM SQLDatabases WHERE db_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT platform_name, db_name FROM BigDataPlatforms JOIN Integration ON BigDataPlatforms.platform_id = Integration.platform_id JOIN SQLDatabases ON Integration.db_id = SQLDatabases.db_id;
